physics.title: AP Physics 1
physics.description: College-level physics course covering Newtonian mechanics, work, energy, and more.

physics.title: AP Physics 2
physics.description: Advanced physics topics including fluids, thermodynamics, electricity, and magnetism.

physics.title: AP Physics C (Mechanics)
physics.description: Calculus-based physics focusing on mechanics with differential equations.

physics.title: AP Physics C (Electricity & Magnetism)
physics.description: Advanced E&M topics with calculus applications and circuit analysis.

physics.title: Physics Grade 9
physics.description: Foundational physics concepts for beginners including motion, forces, and energy.

physics.title: Physics Grade 10
physics.description: Intermediate physics covering waves, sound, light, and basic thermodynamics.

physics.title: Physics Grade 11
physics.description: Comprehensive physics course covering mechanics, waves, and thermodynamics.

physics.title: Physics Grade 12
physics.description: Advanced physics including modern physics, relativity, and quantum mechanics.

math.title: Algebra 1
math.description: Introduction to algebraic concepts, equations, functions, and graphing.

math.title: Algebra 2
math.description: Advanced algebra concepts including quadratic equations, functions, and complex numbers.

math.title: Geometry
math.description: Comprehensive geometry course covering shapes, proofs, and spatial reasoning.

math.title: Pre-Calculus
math.description: Preparation for calculus with trigonometry, functions, and analytical geometry.

math.title: AP Calculus
math.description: College-level calculus covering limits, derivatives, integrals, and applications.

chemistry.title: Chemistry Grade 10
chemistry.description: Introduction to chemistry covering atomic structure, chemical reactions, and periodic table.

chemistry.title: Chemistry Grade 11
chemistry.description: Intermediate chemistry with stoichiometry, bonding, and reaction kinetics.

chemistry.title: Chemistry Grade 12
chemistry.description: Advanced chemistry including organic chemistry, thermodynamics, and electrochemistry.

biology.title: Biology Grade 9
biology.description: Introduction to biology covering cells, genetics, and basic organism classification.

biology.title: Biology Grade 10
biology.description: Intermediate biology with ecology, evolution, and human body systems.

biology.title: Biology Grade 11
biology.description: Advanced biology covering molecular biology, genetics, and cellular processes.

biology.title: Biology Grade 12
biology.description: Comprehensive biology including anatomy, physiology, and biotechnology.

biology.title: AP Biology
biology.description: College-level biology with advanced topics in genetics, evolution, and ecology.

economics.title: Economics
economics.description: Introduction to economic principles, markets, and basic macroeconomic concepts.

economics.title: AP Macroeconomics
economics.description: Advanced study of national economies, fiscal policy, and economic indicators.

economics.title: AP Microeconomics
economics.description: Focus on individual markets, consumer behavior, and firm decision-making.
